summary: Defines the packaging configuration for building and distributing the File Access Policy Analyzer Python library, including discovery of namespace packages and integration of a Rust extension, and implements Git‑based automatic version discovery using Versioneer to provide version information compliant with PEP 440.
business_intent: Enable reliable installation, distribution, and version management of the fapolicy-analyzer tool across Linux environments, simplifying release handling and ensuring compatibility with various package managers.
